name: Shakespeareinsultmessenger
0:
”alexa, launch witty insults”
”Alexa, ask witty insults to give me a funny name”
”alexa, open witty insults”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: witty insults
des: All this does is takes three arrays of strings and grabs a random one of each, concatenates it and reads it out. All the same I use it when i'm texting so I don't have to open another app on my phone... this might be like the smallest time saver
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
